MWC.GUI

Interface Layers.INewItemListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExcludeFromRightClickEdit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreFormatItemListener, HideLayerFormatListener, SetPrimaryListener, TrackNameAtEndFormatListener
    Enclosing class:
    Layers

    public static interface Layers.INewItemListener
extends ExcludeFromRightClickEdit
    interface for classes that want to know about new items being added
    Author:
    ian
